markdownRemark.html:
I was looking for a web blog platforms, and one thing led to another, I found GatsbyJS. After reading some reviews from Medium and official documentation, I wanted to give it a try. It looks pretty cool that Gatsby uses GraphQL to pull the data directly into my blog.

I want to use this blog platform to write and organize my notes (At least one meaningful blog post per week). I believe keeping a polished note/blog would be pretty helpful to keep track of my progress.
